name: Iryna Ivasenko
speech: My name is Irina. I'm beginner frontend developer.I'm active and inquisitive person, I often explore new things. That's why I tried to create a web-site some time ago. Of course, my first site was not very nice and user-friendly. But I liked this process, it impressed me.Now I continue to improve my development skills.
certifications: Date of studying: April – July 2017; SoftServe IT Academy (Web UI)
Date of studying: November – December 2016; Logos IT Academy (Basics of Web UI)
education: Date of studying: 2010-2015; The National Technical University of Ukraine 'Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute'; qualification: specialist’s degree in Law
